name: Fate Overturned!
description:
Thrust into seemingly friendly lands overrun by strange hostile creatures with only a bag of magical dice in hand. The gods left you with the dice as a memento of who controls fate, but are those who have command the ones holding the dice, or those proclaiming power from above? Take destiny under your control and show the gods that you are the one who rolls the dice!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fate Overturned! is a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme "Roll of the Dice." In this top-down rogue-like inspired by Vampire Survivors and 20 Minutes Till Dawn, throw magical dice at endless waves of enemies and grow stronger as you gain experience and add new dice to your dice bag as you level up! How long can you survive?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Future updates:

  • More enemies
  • Bosses
  • More dice types
  • Status upgrades
  • The ability to change fate from dire situations???
